Abilitydex

Name Score Description
Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Snow Warning 9 The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.
Water Compaction 5 Blocks Water-type moves to sharply boost the Pokémon's Defense.
